plugin.openvpn.localization.key.name: OpenVPN
plugin.openvpn.tab.title: OpenVPN configuration
plugin.openvpn.notice: This plugin requires installation of a mobile agent (OpenVPN updated by Headwind MDM)
plugin.openvpn.configuration.choice: Please select a configuration to start setting up OpenVPN
plugin.openvpn.name: VPN name
plugin.openvpn.config.file.placeholder: URL of the OpenVPN configuration file
plugin.openvpn.variable.notice: To create unique .ovpn files for each device, use custom variables (CUSTOM1, CUSTOM2, CUSTOM3)
plugin.openvpn.unsaved: Settings are not yet saved. Click 'Save' to configure OpenVPN!
plugin.openvpn.defaults.saved: The settings have been set as default
plugin.openvpn.reload.notice: Notice: configuration is reloaded only if name or config file URL are changed
plugin.openvpn.force.update.notice: Hint: configuration will be updated after the next launch of the OpenVPN app. To force updating, launch the VPN app remotely.
plugin.openvpn.run.pushed: The signal to run OpenVPN has been pushed to devices
plugin.openvpn.install.app: Please add the OpenVPN mobile application to this configuration
